RelatedSentence: After a poor show in the Lok Sabha polls , the Aam Aadmi Party is now struggling to maintain the high contribution that used to run into a few lakhs per day , until recently .
After a poor show in the Lok Sabha polls , the Aam Aadmi Party is now struggling to maintain the high contribution that used to run into a few lakhs per day , until recently .
Going by official figures , party donations have hit an all time low with the total amount running into a few thousands instead of lakhs , on certain days .
In the last one week , the party , which was once getting an average daily contribution of Rs6-8 lakh , is struggling to touch the one lakh per day mark .
